verbs.description: some veterans [V: are] going into debt waiting for overdue gi bill benefits you can count on us to serve but we ca n't count on the va to make a deadline one veteran said jarid watson va rep david roe veterans of foreign wars committee on veterans affairs wiley department of veteran affairs gi bill jane wiley matt downie terrence hayes committee on veterans affairs david roe air force terrance hayes office of information technology and veterans benefits administration nbc news president donald trump san antonio
